name: Corruption Control Champions
title: Exemplary Corruption Control
description: In 2023, Slovakia achieved a low standard error of 0.1449 in controlling corruption, showcasing its effective governance and transparency measures.

name: Minimalist Aid Givers
title: Limited Aid to Least Developed Countries
description: In 2022, Slovakia's net ODA to the least developed countries was only 0.0006% of its GNI, indicating a minimal contribution to international aid.

name: Trade Tax Triviality
title: Negligible Trade Tax Revenue
description: In 2022, Slovakia's customs and import duties accounted for a mere 0.0001% of tax revenue, reflecting a minimal reliance on trade taxes.

name: Utility Service Excellence
title: Top-Notch Utility Services
description: In 2024, Slovakia scored 86.42 in overall utility services, with a remarkable 91.73 in regulatory quality, highlighting its superior infrastructure.

name: Long Learners
title: Extended Secondary Education
description: In 2023, Slovakia offered a 9-year duration for secondary education, emphasizing its commitment to comprehensive schooling.

name: Income Equality Advocates
title: Balanced Income Distribution
description: In 2022, Slovakia's Gini index was 24.1, with the highest 20% holding 32.4% of income, indicating a relatively equitable income distribution.

name: Industrial Workforce Leaders
title: High Male Employment in Industry
description: In 2023, 49.02% of Slovakia's male workforce was employed in the industry sector, showcasing its industrial strength.
